user_query: I'm conducting a comprehensive analysis of Apple (AAPL) and its competitors. Can you fetch me the list of company peers for Apple? Additionally, I need the average ratios of Apple's peers. Please provide me with this information.

TaskList.description: Fetch the list of company peers for Apple (AAPL). This will involve querying a financial database or API to retrieve the relevant competitive companies.
Calculate the average financial ratios for the list of peers retrieved in Subtask 1. This will require accessing financial data for each peer to compute the averages.
